test-case.name: cbcl-gDay-equal-001
test-case.test: declare function local:gDay($day as xs:integer) { if ($day lt 10) then xs:gDay(concat("---0", $day)) else xs:gDay(concat("---", $day)) }; not(local:gDay(1) eq xs:gDay("---31"))

test-case.name: cbcl-gDay-equal-002
cbcl-gDay-equal-003
cbcl-gDay-equal-004
cbcl-gDay-equal-005
cbcl-gDay-equal-006
test-case.test: declare function local:gDay($day as xs:integer) { if ($day lt 10) then xs:gDay(concat("---0", $day)) else xs:gDay(concat("---", $day)) }; not(local:gDay(1) ne xs:gDay("---31"))

test-case.name: cbcl-gDay-equal-007
cbcl-gDay-equal-008
cbcl-gDay-equal-009
cbcl-gDay-equal-010
cbcl-gDay-equal-011
test-case.test: declare function local:gDay($gDay as xs:gDay, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $gDay }; exists(local:gDay(xs:gDay("---31"), fn:true()) eq xs:gDay("---31"))

test-case.name: cbcl-gDay-equal-012
test-case.test: declare function local:gDay($gDay as xs:gDay, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $gDay }; local:gDay(xs:gDay("---31"), fn:false()) eq xs:gDay("---31")

test-case.name: cbcl-gDay-equal-013
test-case.test: declare function local:gDay($gDay as xs:gDay, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $gDay }; exists(local:gDay(xs:gDay("---31"), fn:true()) ne xs:gDay("---31"))

test-case.name: cbcl-gDay-equal-014
test-case.test: declare function local:gDay($gDay as xs:gDay, $null as xs:boolean) { if ($null) then () else $gDay }; local:gDay(xs:gDay("---31"), fn:false()) ne xs:gDay("---31")
